snippet: Representative Nancy Pelosi of California has agreed to return as House minority leader, as John A. Boehner of Ohio is expected to be re-elected speaker of the House.
abstract: California Democrat Nancy Pelosi agrees to return as House minority leader, while Ohio Republican John A Boehner is expected to be re-elected House speaker.

byline.contributor: John H. Cushman Jr. contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Representative Nancy Pelosi of California has agreed to return as House minority leader, as John A. Boehner of Ohio is expected to be re-elected speaker of the House.

headline.seo: Nancy Pelosi Agrees to Stay On as House Minority Leader
headline.main: Pelosi ‘Wouldn’t Think of Walking Away’ From Job as Minority Leader
headline.print_headline: Pelosi ‘Wouldn’t Think of Walking Away’ From Job as Minority Leader
